content: पुरस्कारः {@--1@} Placing before or in front. {@--2@} Preference. {@--3@} Treating with honour, showing respect, deference. {@--4@} Worshipping. {@--5@} Accompanying, attending. {@--6@} Preparing. {@--7@} Arranging, making complete or perfect. {@--8@} Attacking. {@--9@} Accusation. {@--10@} Consecrating {@--11@} Anticipating, expecting. {@--12@} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Preceded or accompanied by. {@--13@} Sprinkling with holy water. {@--14@} Acceptance.
